messages.title: It's a two horse race: Labour or Tory.
messages.content: Don't let the Tories in the back door. Vote Labour. Vote Jim McGovern.

messages.title: Local people here in Dundee know what the Tories did last time and that they haven't changed - they still don't understand Scotland
messages.content: Voting SNP, Lib Dem or not voting at all will only let the Tories in the back door

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voting SNP, Lib Dem or not voting at all will only let the Tories in the back door

endorsements.endorsement: I don't want the Tories back because... I remember what the Tories did last time. They wouldn't care about families like mine or about protecting our future...
I don't want the Tories back because... They don't help me or my family. They don't care about working families like mine...

I don't want the Tories back because... They'd do nothing to help working families like me. Labour has invested heavily in education, out of school care and nursery places. Labour understands the pressures of bringing up a young family.
I don't want the Tories back because... Unemployment, 15% interest rates, the Tories would create a divide...

images.caption: Jim McGovern and endorsements from local constituents

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet suggests a tactical voting situation and provides endorsements from local constituents but does not elaborate on specific policy details, nor does it provide a personal statement or political experience of the candidate.
